reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Other Services - Aircraft Refurbishment and Major Overhaul. UH-1 Helicopter PDM (SNs 158235 & 68-16264). Information has been Redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions of the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016; including the health and security of implementing partners, as well as national interest of the United States.

description.narrative: Combat international narcotics production and trafficking; reduce the cultivation and production of drugs; prevent the resurgence of drug production; and limit the public health effects of the drug trade through international drug control and demand reduction, prevention and treatment projects.

This award strives to combat international narcotics production and trafficking; reduce the cultivation and production of drugs; prevent the resurgence of drug production; and limit the public health effects of the drug trade trhough international drug control and demand reduction, prevention and treatment projects. More specifically, this includes Includes contractual purchases covering services and material furnished under agreement and not otherwise identified. It may include contractual personal services of doctors, etc., when they furnish supplies or charge for use of equipment, and, therefore, are not classified as contractual personal services under 1100.. Covers the costs to restore equipment to a like new condition. Includes contractual purchases covering services and material furnished under agreement and not otherwise identified. It may include contractual personal services of doctors, etc., when they furnish supplies or charge for use of equipment, and, therefore, are not classified as contractual personal services under 1100.. Peru UH-1 Helicopter Programmed Depot Maintenance - Modification P00014: Add funds for line item 103. Critical Flight Safety Program. Peru UH-1 Helicopter Programmed Depot Maintenance - Modification P00015: De-obligate excess funds from line items 003 and 103.. Critical Flight Safety Program[Covers the costs to restore equipment to a like new condition. Includes contractual purchases covering services and material furnished under agreement and not otherwise identified. It may include contractual personal services of doctors, etc., when they furnish supplies or charge for use of equipment, and, therefore, are not classified as contractual personal services under 1100.]. Critical Flight Safety Program[Covers the costs for the repair and maintenance of aircraft. Includes contractual purchases covering services and material furnished under agreement and not otherwise identified. It may include contractual personal services of doctors, etc., when they furnish supplies or charge for use of equipment, and, therefore, are not classified as contractual personal services under 1100.].
